reviews.review:
[h1] El padre de los shooters modernos [/h1]
Con una narrativa en tiempo real nunca antes vista en su época y la típica historia cliché de una invasión alienígena. Así es como se presenta el primer Half-Life, la opera prima de Valve.
Un gran videojuego con variedad de niveles, puzzles, y armas (¡muchas armas!). Los años le han caído un poco mal, y se nota que ha envejecido bastante; pero a pesar de todo, es uno de esos títulos que fueron (y son) importantes para la industria, y que se deberían probar al menos una vez en la vida.
Ah, y el multijugador esta bueno, pero por dios nerfeen, el cañon Tau.

ES... WOW, nunca entendí el gusto por la franquicia, un juego de disparos con buena historia y aliens? pero probarlo fue chevere, la gente le gusta no solo por su buen diseño de niveles o su historia (que también son buenos) si no sus detalles, las apariciones de Gman, como actúan los enemigos la buena inteligencia artificial, es muy detallista, jueguen lo

Half-Life still stands out from other shooters not only with its story but gameplay. Cons are: Platforming can get annoying especially near the end and that's it. If you like shooters and you haven't played this do yourself a favor and play this. Its only ten bucks trust me you wont regret it.
Do you know who ate all the doughnuts?
What can I say about this game that hasn't already been said 1,000,000 times? It's a classic and should be experienced by every PC gamer at least once IMHO. Try it!

Que es Half Life?
Para el ciego, la luz.
Para el muerto, la vida.
Para el hambriento, la comida.
Si Half Life tiene un millón de fans, yo soy uno de ellos.
Si Half Life tiene un fan, ese fan soy yo.
Si Half Life no tiene ningún fan, es que he muerto.

одна из самых поэтичных игр,а главный герой вообще удивил-постоянные философские высказывания, придумывает на ходу стихи, любит поговорить сам с собой
К его мыслям прислушаться советую,игра класс
Легенда всех времён. Геймплей староват,но шикарен и увлекателен,много интересных головоломок,да и сложность имеется. Рекомендую
buen chuter 👍. si te preocupan los graficos sos un mogulazo
the game has a good story but the movment is really anoying. the combat is good i engoy the game but it is showing its age
even being from 1998. this is one of the most unique shooters i've ever played
Great game but pretty dated. Play black mesa
still holds up as a fun game today.
i like part where me finish
Guys, chill... it's half-life, i'm supposed to half of my time here.
Это просто классика жанра, обязательно к прохождению. Всё в это игре изумительно, кроме Ксена. Он правда ужасен.

Einfach eines der besten Spiele überhaupt. Gewiss auf dem selben Level wie Spiele des gleichen Hauses Valve wie z.B. Portal oder Portal 2. Half-Life war für mich genial, atmosphärisch und erstaunlich gut gealtert für ein Spiel, welches 1998 herauskam. Ich präferiere Half-Life sogar Half-Life 2. Schade, dass es (noch) keinen dritten Teil gibt.
It's half-life. Buy it already! Around 14-18 hours of first playthrough (even more id you want to see everything).I'll recommend you to buy it at sale if you for the low price of 1€.
Everything except for Xen (the final act of the game) is great.
WAIT YOUR TELLING ME THIS GAME WAS ONLY 4 HOURS LONG?

The complexity makes this game very fun, would recommend for anyone of age if they can use a mouse and keyboard, is it hard? yes, it really is, is it fun? if you like shooting and puzzels, then very much yes, at the time of write, i have not finished the game yet, will do soon.
this game is like 8 years older than i am and i still find it amazing to this very day. its hard but the fun kind of hard and its fun to mod.
Just started playing it and it is a blast. I love the  story.

Los gráficos en su época eran de los mejores. Sin embargo, la forma en que este juego cuenta su historia, es ÚNICA. Vale la pena probarlo si tienes una PC de Cartón y también, si deseas jugar a las expansiones creadas por la comunidad a lo largo de los años, que si bien no son oficiales, poseen un excelente trabajo detrás, logrando una calidad al nivel de Blue Shift y Opposing Force.

Agradezco a Valve, por darnos la oportunidad de probar y conocer este juego gracias a su promoción gratuita pero limitada, en 2020 por la llegada de Half-Life Alyx, que combinado a la situación mundial, el juego tomó un aura completamente interesante.
too tedious,and very confusing at times. if you can get past those,you should but it.
solo me lo compré por la black ops tetona
it's good and fun but a bit tricky and some areas really use your brain look all round and fun the stupid logic cause there's a lot of it here in the game :)

gra jest świetna pomimo upływu czasu fajna fabuła oraz zabawa w tej grze ja sam w to napierdzielam
początkowo na telefonie (tak to jest możliwe) aż do teraz
naprawde polecam ;)
Esse aí foi da cabeça ao pé da cabra.
eres old pero asi de old?
Bom demais e as vezes frustrante

I'd recommend this game for anyone remotely interested in the Half-life series and/or Garry's Mod. And also prepare to bravely bravely run away from enemies at some points because running away is an option sometimes.
купил только ради модов и вам также советую
DÜŞÜNME ÇOK LAGLI BUGLU DEME AL ALDIR OYNA OYNATTIR :)

I played this game for the first time in 2022.  It was a lot of fun.  The boss battles and puzzles were challenging but very rewarding.  The story is also very cool.  Highly recommended for those interested in the classics.

полноценный законченный продукт без dlc, микро транзакций, гачи системы и других способов доения игроков
отличный геймплей и продуманный сюжет
БЕСПЛАТНАЯ КАСТОМИЗАЦИЯ ПЕРСОНАЖА В МУЛЬТИПЛЕЕРЕ, да где такое видано 

PS: opsing force и blue shift являются аддонами а не dlc

Half life is a game I played when I was young, and to this day will still go back. As much as modern games have changed my opinion on old games, half life is one of the few games that's actually fun to go back to. There's something about the classic graphics and simple plot that's just really enjoyable to play through
so waren die alten spiele einfach cooooooool
Больше положительных оценок богу положительных оценок

半条命不愧是经典中的经典，1998年在那个时代全球第一个大胆将射击爽游和剧情连在一起的公司，后面还因为采用当时社区做的竞技地图创造了CS，直到现在在极多射击游戏中仍然能够看到他的影子，可以说是相当的NB。都2022年了但我仍然在玩这款游戏，因为半条命的人是不会从时代落伍的只要稍微了解单机游戏圈的人都无不了解半条命，甚至在聊天的时候抛出半条命的话题光聊剧情都能聊上大半天，就连现在服务器都还在运行着，20多年并没有使这款游戏落伍，能够让不同的时代、不同年代的人都喜欢上这同一款游戏属实很不可思议，可以说是相当的NB！相当的不可思议！
顺便再问问G胖，半条命2.5以VR都推出了，好久出半条命3和传送门3啊！！！
Really good game, even though the game is old and don't have really good graphics but still a good game. Puzzle game, shooting, etc..
I've never been so late to the party when it comes to games, but, I can easily say over two decades after this game came out that it's better than most modern fps games I've played.
This game i really enjoy it.
una campaña muy duradera y divertida recomendado

um dos melhores jogos que eu joguei da Valve
Nota:10/10

Я уже достаточно поиграл в эту игру и могу высказать своё мнение:
-Нравится что эта игра в 2022 году смотрится неплохо
-Как по мне есть главы которые уж слишком тяжёлые и ты проходишь их еле еле на 1-10 здоровья
-Очень нравится управление
-отлично перепроходить

Absolutely brilliant game!

The combat is brilliant, at first because you can basically move like doom guy you think you're practically invincible...typical strong FPS protagonist. 
However, soon you figure out you have to think to survive. 
Playing with caution and skiull instead of blindly rushing corners.
very clever game with fun puzzles, parkour, fighting and expolration.
Pretty good sound effects that genuinely immerse you, especially the guns- you feel as if you're actually handling a deadly weapon.

Overall, very fun game, basic story but very immersive and fantastic for its age! :D
